name: Nature Transformation
description:
In dark spring nights, in the silence of the grass and secretly from prying eyes, moon flowers are born. Their appearance lures the fairies that feed on lunar pollen.

Protect your flower from infringement of other people's fairies.Choose a color appropriate to the enemy fairy and put it on the enemy's path.

Remember that the fairies reserve are limited for three seconds, and then they disappear. You can place a fairy only on a free area.

Hold out as long as possible.

*****************
Controls
*****************

In Windows:  H - change fairy color or if you want click left mouse button on the circle in the lower left corner.  
Left mouse button - put the fairy on  the screen.

In Android: tap circle in the lower left corner to change fairy color. Tap on free place to put the fairy on  the screen.
